Package org.world.tiles

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
org.world.GameObject
org.world.tiles.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroundTile, VoidTile
public abstract class Tile
extends GameObject
This abstract class implements a basic ground tile object, which make up the playable area. Each tile has a certain texture,height and traversable property(i.e. whether or not the player or other entities such as enemies can move across it). All tiles share the same dimensions which take part in isometric computations.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Do nothing
      Specified by:
      update in class GameObject

    • render

      public void render()
      Override the usual GameObject render method, needs a slightly different offset to render at correct location. If a tile is located at a height greater than 0, all the space below it will be drawn with the same texture to create the illusion of multiple stacked tiles.
      Overrides:
      render in class GameObject
